summary: This bill, S. 2718, amends the Community Development Banking and Financial Institutions Act of 1994 to provide capitalization assistance to enhance the liquidity of community development financial institutions (CDFIs). It allows the Fund to purchase loans, provide guarantees, and otherwise support CDFIs. The bill also modifies reporting requirements and allocates funds received back into the Fund for further assistance to CDFIs. The bill prioritizes organizations with relevant experience and impact on underserved communities. Finally, it addresses the use of funds related to Emergency Capital Investment Funds.
